messages.message: Code style question - should we still be indicating unicode on our strings (i.e. `u''`)? We are in Py3 now but what will our philosophy be around customers who really really want to use Python 2?
@dlluncor you may have opinions on this
is there anyone pushing hard for py2?

Not that I know of, but I can imagine a scenario where 2-3 years down the road we have a mid-small size company that has really really old codebases maybe? Or a scenario where a company wants to integrate some large Python2 project as a UDF, in which case app-tasks will be running in Py2
